title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Instructional Methods Utilizing an SMS-Based Formative Math Assessment System

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Possess the ability to design formative assessments of mathematical concepts using an SMS-based quiz system

Learners will analyze learner response data (quizzes, surveys, discussion participation, etc.) collected via the LMS to establish customized feedback strategies categorized into three types (basic, advanced, supplementary) based on individual comprehension levels (<80%/≥80%), and implement them within two weeks in actual classes

Learners will create 10 mobile-optimized assessment items (short-answer, true/false, drag-and-drop) adhering to design standards (responsive layout, readability, interactive elements) and achieve ≥80% suitability in peer review and expert evaluation
Build a monitoring system for academic achievement in asynchronous assessment environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
